name: Space Crusade!
description: It’s time to “remind” the heathens of the holy land of Jerusalem and its teachings, no matter how far away they may be! The players will assume the roles of a highly specialised leading task force of crusaders that, through the sheer force of belief, the holy land has blessed us with the ability to breathe the nothingness of space. We will teach the "Otherworlders" through the might of our swords ! For Space Jerusalem!
